lender.name: Glenys & Bruce
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to keep on keeping on!

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: God has been good to me, and I want to share that luck with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a poet. I write about my family, my spiritual beliefs and about war.

lender.name: Kuniko
lender.loan_because: I have always wanted to do something to someone who needed a help.

lender.name: Junko
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Takashi & Masayo
lender.loan_because: I am glad if becoming a start to which you seize a chance.

lender.name: esther
lender.occupational_info: i need a loan from kiva-how do i go about it

lender.name: Josie
lender.loan_because: I love to feel good about myself.
lender.occupational_info: It's hard to be this cute.

lender.name: Pam & Wayne
lender.loan_because: We like reading the stories. We enjoy helping someone make a better life for themselves and their families. Paying-it-Forward is truly a wonderful thing!

lender.name: miriam and derek
lender.loan_because: We have everything we need. There are many things we want but we really do not need them and we want others to have a chance at a better life. We decided this year to make donations instead of getting gifts for birthdays and christmas etc. It gives you a really good feeling to help someone and we are looking forward to building up a good sized portfolio.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large hardware store selling water pumps, generators, electric and gas motors mainly to farmers, contractors etc. My husband reconditions car batteries and also has an entertainment business which provides music at weddings, proms birthday parties etc.

lender.name: barbara
lender.loan_because: I want to help people
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office as a secretary. Most of my day is spent typing documents and correspondence, making appointments, arranging meetings and taking minutes at meetings. One of my hobbies is making bead jewellery including necklaces, bracelets and earrings and I am starting to sell them as a small business venture.

lender.name: Jose
lender.loan_because: Most people need money much more than I do

lender.name: Yoshitaka Nishimura
lender.loan_because: I think that I only have to become help of people who have the motivation. Please hold out taking care of health very.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I can do it nowadays
lender.occupational_info: Stressing, tiring but nice

lender.name: Sharman
lender.loan_because: It gives me the sense of fulfillment. What is considered a small amount of money to me has the ability to make a huge impact in the lives of these individuals, their family and community members.
lender.occupational_info: I review and negotiate business contracts for an internet technology company.

lender.name: Michiko
lender.loan_because: 自分の力で働いてお金を稼ぐ事は とても重要です。その為に少し、私も力を貸してあげられる事を幸せに思います。

lender.name: Lou & Cathi & Family
lender.loan_because: We feel that this is a wonderful way to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Lou is a marketing rep; Cathi is a licensed watercolor artist & publisher.

lender.name: Yusuke
lender.loan_because: I wanna reduce poverty through business. and I believe the potential of entrepreneurs in developing countries.

lender.name: Camille
lender.loan_because: I live with many blessings and I know they are meant to be shared. We are one world and unity through simple things like this create balance and harmony in our chaotic world.

lender.name: Lyndell
lender.loan_because: I think I live a very fortunate life and that we all have an obligation to do whatever we can to lend a hand to others who are less fortunate. If i can make a difference to someone else's life with an amount I can afford then maybe I have gone a little way to doing that.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I know if that was me, someone would lend me money.
lender.occupational_info: Going to School.

lender.name: Taina
lender.loan_because: Bis dat qui cito dat

lender.name: Doris
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I believe that these people will work hard to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work with musicians from West Africa & Cuba to help make their music become known internationally.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I'm trying to teach children the value of money.

lender.name: miri
lender.loan_because: i saw a show of opra , and she intreduced to me kiva. i like this idea, and i was lokking for a long time a way to help others

lender.name: Leslie
lender.occupation: piano teacher and stay at home wife and mother

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I don't need anything and want to help those that do.

lender.name: kyle
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school senior. I love to surf and travel.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunities I've had in my life and wish the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: Being a mother is universally understood. I raise and nurture my son.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: There's nothing more important than helping someone in need.

lender.name: Remi & Wendy
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone has the ability to do great things in life. The motive or motivation to do things is internal, but, we all need a little help sometimes. Kiva is a great vehicle to lend a little help to those with the motive inside them.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and give them a chance they should be given to help themselves and others in their community.
lender.occupational_info: I'm just a high school student trying to figure out what to do with my life!

lender.name: Ashley
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Oregon Breast and cervical Cancer Program helping uninsured and under insured women get breast and cervical cancer screening.

lender.name: Monica & Bob
lender.loan_because: We want to share the enormous love we have for each other with those who want to make a better world.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I believe in the idea of a global community and the necessity of helping one another.

lender.name: Sean and Alison
lender.loan_because: We're middle class Canadians, the luckiest people in the world. Everyone deserve the same kind of life.

lender.name: Mikeeli
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: Instead of friends giving me a birthday gift, they brought a small donation that I would collect for Kiva...they were so generous. Thank you friends!! I hope to see how many people we can help by reinvesting when the loan is repaid!

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a positive difference in another person's life.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I know that this is a way in which I can help people across the globe. It troubles me that there is so much conflict in our world and I think that helping everyone to acheive stability is an essential first step in bringing our world together.
lender.occupational_info: I work on helping create new innovation for household appliances (dishwashers, washing machines, etc.) with my primary focus being on innovation for health benefits.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: Beats haggling with the investment community and greedy business sharks focused on the capital raising markets in Australia
lender.occupational_info: Business management consulting and capital raising

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate and I want to share my good fortune with other people who need a helping hand. I believe in a hand up--not a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I handle the accounting side of a large interstate trucking company.

lender.name: LEIGH
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a dream!
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife, and mother of three teens/young adults. I am also a full time student seeking a degree in Humanities.

lender.name: Meg and Sequoia Students
lender.loan_because: We want to help women start businesses.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of high school students in California who want to help support other women in the world.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.occupation: Assistant Director of Admissions Mesa State Colleg
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help students go to college.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Vandboeffelklubben
lender.loan_because: “Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it´s the only thing that ever has.” Margaret Mead, American Cultural Anthropologist
lender.occupational_info: LOWB/Vandboeffelklubben means Loyal Order of Water Buffaloes. Our mission is to provide poor families a water buffalo in countries where it is espesially needed. A water buffalo can lead a hungry family out of poverty and give them a chance for a bright future filled with hope and free from hunger. The animal provides draft power for planting rice and potatoes, milk for protein and manure for fertilizer and fuel. Claus Moller,World President

lender.name: Rubén Sotelo
lender.loan_because: I think that is one of the best ways to offer opportunities to poor families so that they can develop their potential with the aid of microcredits´s institutions.
lender.occupational_info: Civil engineer and university teacher.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: According to Paul Collier's book "The Bottom Billion", private investment is much needed in slow economies. Poor countries are generally too risky for a major investment. Micro-lending is a great way to provide private funding without assuming a great risk.
lender.occupational_info: I help people keep their money safe.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I want to help teachers around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I taught school for 37 years. I know what it means to be a teacher and am happy to be able to help teachers and their families.

lender.name: Sherri
lender.loan_because: we are all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: i like to see the use in things others would consider useless

lender.name: Reger Family
lender.loan_because: People matter.
lender.occupational_info: He fixes what is broken. She finds out how it is made.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: A small drop in the bucket has a ripple effect. I imagine people all over the world in business for themselves and know this will truly change their lives and the world economy.
lender.occupational_info: I am jewelry designer and I have my own little shops on the web.

lender.name: Simon Suh
lender.loan_because: Kiva means unity.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a big fan of great ideas.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I am happy to help someone who is trying to help themself. Plus, I try to live by the Gandhi quote "We Must Become The Change We Wish To See In The World."
lender.occupational_info: I am an actress in film & television. I get much joy out of allowing other people to remove themselves from their own lives for a brief period of time and possibly feeling certain emotions they might not normally feel, as I bring to life the characters that I play on screen.

lender.name: Mrs. Shafer's Class
lender.loan_because: My 5th grade students are learning the value of giving to people who hope to make life better for themselves, their families, and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a public school teacher. I teach 5th grade. My students are between the ages of 10-11. Our class raised money by making cards and selling them at school in order to donate money to entreprenuers around the world.

lender.name: Family B.O.B.C.I.D.
lender.occupational_info: We are a Canadian family of 18 who care about other families in the world.

lender.name: larry
lender.loan_because: I would like to help shrink the gap between the top and bottom of the wealth spectrum.

lender.name: The Pyke Family
lender.loan_because: We hope that we can make a difference to people's lives by helping them reach their goals
lender.occupational_info: We work in the disability field and together with our children we are all happy and healthy - we are a very lucky family

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: good people need help and if I am able, then it's my job as a Christian to do so!

lender.name: Radiance
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Deanne
lender.loan_because: I believe in people

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: supporting self-reliance is the greatest contribution we can make to the welfare of others.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies create brands like "Coca-Cola," "Nike," and "Apple."

lender.name: Cameron
lender.loan_because: because I think it's fun to help other people. I really want to help people in Africa and India because they need me most.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a very good drawer, I'm nice (and you can tell that because I'm helping people), I am fast (running), and I'm a very good fisherman.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I want to help good people who need to catch a break.
lender.occupational_info: I am attending University to become a high school history teacher and baseball coach.

lender.name: steven
lender.loan_because: because i can i should and i will and darnit , makes me feel all warm and fuzy inside.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: It's more fun that buying crap on eBay.
lender.occupational_info: In America we have a very complicated system to pay for health care that costs everyone way too much money. Unfortunately I am part of the expense of that system. I help non-profit doctors get as much as possible from the insurance companies and the government to pay for low-income people's health care.

lender.name: Evelyn
lender.loan_because: I have been so very blessed and I have a passion to help women who face challenges from their circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I am a partner in a business that provides professional business services to large corporations.

lender.name: Osamu
lender.loan_because: I beleived in the Living Money must wait for the people need it.
lender.occupational_info: I am living in tokyo, and sometimes have actions as a volanteer member of the NGOs , for PR about poor, hunger, refgee and war.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: Knowing who the recipient is and how it will help them, feels good and then being able to do it all over again for someone else - great!!

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: People need it and it is great to see where the contributions go.

lender.name: Ric
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to make a positive difference to someone else's life.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I plan to be around for the next 80+ years, and I want the world to be even better on my way out.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: The people and their stories fascinate and move me. They bring me hope and encouragement, they light up the world and make it a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a journalist and I write stories about people and events, I lay out and design newsletters and fliers and other materials for publishing. I create art -- mixed media art -- in my "spare" time.

lender.name: Yoshi
lender.loan_because: We could not solve poverty by the legacy politics. So, we have to find and do it new way. Walk on together!
lender.occupational_info: I develop open source for my business client. And share it to the world. I'm a webmaster of amnesty international japan too.

lender.name: Jon & Deanne
lender.loan_because: I know the hard work it takes when you are self employed. The dedication to their trade and their efforts to improve their lives is truly inspiring. It's a fantastic program and we are so thankful that we can help.
lender.occupational_info: I negotiate the leases and sales of office buildings in the Sacramento, CA region and my wife is the CEO of our home and children.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: helping others is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Roland
lender.loan_because: We can help those who try to help themselves and it might make a small difference to the world.
lender.occupational_info: I worked as an administrator in the Queensland Government but have been retired for some years.

lender.name: K n K
lender.loan_because: We can and we want to

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are less fortunate than myself but are willing to work hard to rise out of poverty.

lender.name: claire
lender.loan_because: it is good to be able to help small business owners grow their businesses and support their families.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want to help . . . and now, I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach adult students at a community college.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: I like helping people to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I am retired

lender.name: John Engen
lender.loan_because: I have been richly blessed and assisted by many others over the years. I am honored to have the opportunity to reach out to others that might benefit in some small way. In turn, perhaps each of those that benefit, will assist others, multiplying the positive impact all across the globe.
lender.occupational_info: offering a leg-up, not a hand-out.

lender.name: Albert
lender.loan_because: I hope the money will do some people good.
lender.occupational_info: I help design, assemble, and maintain small to large computer networks for larger companies.

lender.name: Blane
lender.loan_because:
I've had the chance to see firsthand what a difference access to credit can make, and how difficult peoples' lives can be without it.
Does Kiva help to resolve the huge structural imbalances at the root of the inequality between North and South? No.
Does it help people in the South to live better lives in spite of these inequalities? I hope so.
lender.occupational_info: I develop training programs on the impacts of climate change.

lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to lift oneself out of poverty, and how difficult it can be to obtain a loan to do so. I'm very honored to be able to play a small part in the success of these hard working people.
lender.occupational_info: I help women and their children stay physically healthy.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I care about people.
lender.occupational_info: International Behavior, Culture and Relationship Consultant, writer and talk show guest.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I'm inspired by the courage of the borrowers and am often moved to contribute :)
lender.occupational_info: Fine Jewelry Sales - aid clients in making the best decisions in their jewelry purchases Marketing Consultant - advise new companies in best practice methods to bring their products to market.

lender.name: Shireen
lender.loan_because: I read a book by Somaly Mam called "Road to Lost Innocence", about her difficult life growing up in Cambodia. Somaly channelled her pain into helping women in Cambodia and around the world. She was inspiring to me, I started making loans to women in Cambodia and other countries.
lender.occupational_info: Executive Search, Talent Sourcing, Recruitment, Career Management.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It is good to encourage people to establish a new business, especially in developing regions of the world.
lender.occupational_info: French Vacation rental properties. Holiday rental properties in Provence, Paris and Monaco.

lender.name: jean pierre
lender.loan_because: Les petits ruisseaux, font les grandes rivières
lender.occupational_info: I work for a big society of food distribution (the first one of Europe) I am in service reception of the goods

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I want to help others grow their businesses and improve their lives.

lender.name: sharafat
lender.loan_because: i m in a big problem, 7 persons dependent on me, and now my business not working properly, i need some money to run my business.
lender.occupational_info: i provides car on hire to the tourist and corporate world.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: IT WORKS !

lender.name: Olivier & Vanessa
lender.loan_because: we want to make this world better for our son.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: It's that fundamental belief — I am my brother's keeper, I am my sister's keeper — that makes this country work. It's what allows us to pursue our individual dreams, yet still come together as a single American family. "E pluribus unum." Out of many, one. Barack Obama.
lender.occupational_info: Stress Reduction Specialist :-)

lender.name: Phillip B
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering those who work to get ahead
lender.occupational_info: Working to improve working conditions around the world

lender.name: Bronte
lender.loan_because: I remember what it's like to do it tough.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I believe that the collective actions of enough individuals can change the world and reverse the damage that our governments have caused (and continue to cause) to weaker countries.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a very capitalist business...banking! My role is to help to eliminate inefficiency so enabling my colleagues to improve their customer service.

lender.name: wendy
lender.loan_because: i would like to help someone achieve their dreams as i achieved mine because of someone elses help
lender.occupational_info: i look after the running of a small hearing aid supplier office. i love my work because i meet all sorts of people from all backgrounds

lender.name: Elsie
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to start the day! And no matter how much I didn't achieve what I set out to do all day, at least I did this. How easy is that?
lender.occupational_info: It's very diverse and non-traditional. It's a 'lifestyle' work-life, living what you do.

lender.name: Nicolette Bouw
lender.loan_because: I want to do something good for this world! And give women an oppurtunity to start their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I am an interior designer and currently living in the USA.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I need to be reminded how blessed I am...
lender.occupational_info: I endeavour to open the eyes and minds of young monolingual Australians to the wider world.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who desire to make a better life for themselves and their families. I am grateful for those who have helped me and I would like to return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: I manage national and international non-profit groups.

lender.name: Iljko
lender.occupation: I sell healthy Sparkling Apple Juice frm S Africa

lender.name: Thompson family
lender.loan_because: We do this because this as an opportunity to help other people feel good about themselves through achieving their goals. We also see this as a way to multiply the effect of the money we lend.
lender.occupational_info: Judy did a lot of craft work at home (knitting, babies blankets and clothes, crocheting, jewelery) that we give to hospitals to either give to needy families or sell to raise much needed funds.

lender.name: Ath. Anagnostopoulos
lender.loan_because: i really hope to get rich through this!

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I've recently developed a strong interest in microcredit and the concept of building community trust and solidarity through supporting small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I work with educationally disadvantaged students in an afterschool program that provides them with mentors, helps improve their academic performance, expose them to new cultural activities, and helps them with career and vocational planning.

lender.name: Jessie
lender.loan_because:
I want to help break down the sometimes insurmountable entry barriers to small business in the developing world.
Je souhaite aider à culbuter les barrières d'entrée qui sont parfois très grands dans les pays en développement.
lender.occupational_info:
I work at National Public Radio, which is a public radio station payed for by citizens, businesses and the government. I help interns develop stories to share on the radio and online. I am also going to school to become a lawyer.
Je travail à National Public Radio, un station de radio qui se paye par des citoyens, des enterprises et le gouvernement. Je fais de développement des histoires des stagières pour la radio et l'Internet. J'étudie aussi le droit.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I know the panic and frustration that set in when you can't afford a meal or necessary medication. I was on U.S. food stamps for a year; without assistance I wouldn't be self-sufficient today. I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I help library workers advocate for fair salaries.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want people to have successful and sustainable businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I help people research and select careers.

lender.name: Tokyo Vegans Club
lender.loan_because: We believe microcredit is effective for empowering women in male-dominated society. If the status of women is raised, it will reduce both poverty and violence against women.

lender.name: NSCDS
lender.loan_because: Our school's motto is "Live and Serve". We think Kiva is an excellent way to fulfill that mission!
lender.occupational_info: We are a pre-Kindergarten through twelfth grade school that has been around since 1919. Our Kiva account is managed by teachers and students in the upper school, grades 9-12.

lender.name: Kohmei
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: check figures to deliver foods in efficient ways.

lender.name: felipearango
lender.loan_because: It empowers.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: we're all in the same human family.
lender.occupational_info: I help people have better health and well-being through proper nutrition.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to help.

lender.name: Prows Family
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in people's live for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I meet lots of people -- from lots of places around the world.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: It's a very small way to help change someone else's life for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I make it easier for lawyers to do their jobs.

lender.name: joey
lender.loan_because: Kiva was the name of a study room at my high school (UNIS) in New York City. I thought I could change the world then. This Kiva allows me to give back, one person at a time.

lender.name: Zhila
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone the opportunity to start something new with their life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student in International Policy Studies. I also work as a research assistant for a study abroad program in California.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I want other people to talke pride in their work and to be self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with physical disabilities to achieve their maximum level of funciton.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I can and it teaches my teenage son that giving is good. He chose the Ghanain ladies.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Daryn
lender.loan_because: Do unto others...we all need a little help in one way or another.

lender.name: Kai, Corwin, Liti & Zoe
lender.loan_because: We're loaning because we want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: Kai is 8 years old and goes to school in England; Corwin is 7 years old, and also goes to school in England; Zoe is their great aunt and is a film programmer and writer in the US.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: Like most people, I can afford to help more than I often bother to do!

lender.name: Molinkids
lender.loan_because: We believe in the future
lender.occupational_info: Wake up, play, eat and have fun. Listen to music. Cuddle.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together!
lender.occupational_info: I teach mathematics in a secondary school.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I admire persons who work hard to get ahead under difficult conditions
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired high school teacher who spent 34 years teaching kids and counseling. I also was instrumental in establishing mental and physical health clinics in the 2 high schools in our city.

lender.name: Nate
lender.loan_because: it's a brilliant way to aid enterprising people in lower income locales.
lender.occupational_info: I pastor a church and I sell internet security software to big companies.

lender.name: Mitch Aase
lender.occupation: Still don't know what I want to be when I grow up
lender.loan_because: To help others is always rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: There is no tombstone with the inscription: "I wish I had spent more time at the office"

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people, as I have been helped in the past. A hand up is much greater than a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I run a nationwide IT and consulting company.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I can. I believe we all should help others if we have the ability to do so. It makes me feel good knowing I am helping someone help themselves.

lender.name: Melly
lender.loan_because: So my son can grow and appreciate people all over the world, learning to give and help

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I feel this is a good way to help those in developong countries in a real way.
lender.occupational_info: I negotiate telecom contracts for major corporations for wireless services with my company.

lender.name: April & Demetri Jr
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good to be able to help other people! Come on it's not hard to loan $25 out to someone for a good cause!!
lender.occupational_info: I work as the manager for our local corporation.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves an opportunity to reach their unrealilzed potential. We can all be worth $100 million if only we realized it and shared it with the world.

lender.occupational_info: I develop products for refrigerating food to avoid loss of food and to preserve food quality.

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: Maybe I can make a difference to someone's life

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I don't think it's fair, our more economically developed countries being so well off as they are, and any help we can give to people in developing economies will make some difference to the people's lives, if nothing else.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, taking a year out from my studies before I start a degree course. Otherwise, at the moment I work in a basic grocery shop behind the counter.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupational_info: In America, there are racetracks where people bet money on greyhound dogs. When the dogs are not good enough to make money at the racetrack, many of them are killed. But these dogs make wonderful pets. So we take the dogs from the racetracks and try to find families who will love them. We have 6 of them as family pets.

lender.name: Naama
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for my parents for giving me the opportunities i have and i wish to help others do the same for their families. Also its nice to see the people who gets the money, and the difference it make to their life.
lender.occupational_info: Graphic Designer

lender.name: Bobby & Marie
lender.loan_because:
"The Church considers it her task always to call attention to the dignity and rights of those who work, to condemn situations in which that dignity and those rights are violated, and to help to guide changes so as to ensure authentic progress by man and society."
~Pope John Paul II, Laborem Exercens

lender.name: Vada
lender.loan_because: I hope to help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a scavenger, I buy anything I think I can sell and find a good home for.

lender.name: Sharyn
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of businesses small and large to improve the quality of people's lives. I believe creating economic opportunity, especially for women and girls, is good for communities and the environment.
lender.occupational_info: I am a marketing consultant and writer. I help businesses reach their customers and write stories to help people understand what they have to offer.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Dull.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know I can help someone achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I plan training for an accounting firm. That includes developing training courses, teaching, and overall planning of logistics and execution of the courses.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I watched Oprah and saw Kiva and was inspired for the first time in a really long time. Kiva makes sense to me in terms of giving. I give to charity every month but this in many ways is better than simply writing a cheque. I'm passionate about self empowerment and providing an opportunity for individuals to help themselves. I get so much from giving. I am so lucky to know about Kiva! Thank you all.
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelance project manager and at the moment I am working with the health agency here in London to improve health services for children and young people. I also work for a charity that campaigns for children's rights who are living in the care of the state.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: A small bit of help can make all the difference in someone else's life. My son told me about pay it forward!

lender.name: Kimberly & Pete
lender.loan_because: To share and that it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: The moving and Supply of Materials to people that need them.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: in some way I may help to improve someone's quality of life

lender.name: REBECCA
lender.loan_because: Like attracts like, positive attracts positive......therefore I get it back ten fold.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who struggle with alcohol or drugs in their lives.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I would like to see my money actually go straight to an individual who needed help

lender.loan_because: I admire bravery.

lender.name: Jameson
lender.loan_because: Diversify my portfolio

lender.name: Lindsay

lender.name: Thom

lender.occupational_info: Along with a crew of talented, caring souls, I create custom cabinetry & furniture in ways & with materials that are sensitive to our earth and its peoples. I am married to a beautiful inspiration. I am blessed with life in this moment. I believe in hope, like Kiva.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I take my hat to people who get off their backside and do something about it. I am more than happy to assist those people financially.

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: I feel lucky to live in Australia and have so many opportunities that others do not.

lender.name: Lila
lender.loan_because: I have had tremendous good fortune in my life, and God has given me blessings too many to count. I want to send some help to someone who is trying to get themselves set up into business, particularly women.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor, and have had 18 years of experience practicing Family Practice medicine. In 2005, I had a complex health situation that left me with mobility limitations and pain. I can no longer practice medicine like I used to, so I found that I can teach online, Anatomy and Physiology and Neuroscience.

lender.loan_because: WE ARE REQUIRED TO HELP AND LOVE ONE ANOTHER
lender.occupational_info: I MAKE MEDS

lender.loan_because: If you give a man a fish you feed him for a day. If you give a man the resources to fish for himself then you feed him for a life time.
lender.occupational_info: I do financial planning for individuals.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because:

lender.occupational_info: I work with lots of different companies to help them be organised and get on with what they are good at!

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I am able to and that means l'm lucky and fortunate
lender.occupational_info: I used to run an emergency response service for older people in trouble.

lender.name: Rohan
lender.loan_because: A hand up is so much more constructive than a hand out. Long term charity is destructive. Micro loans help to empower people to create a new and on-going income stream. What could be better

lender.name: Ellie
lender.loan_because: I want others to have better lives so that we may all have a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer for a charitable organisation that helps people in crisis. This can be because they lose a job, a relationship breakdown, illness, addiction, death of family or friend etc. In fact, we advise and help on anything and everything. It's often hard work and can be upsetting but, on a good day, very rewarding.

lender.name: Graham

lender.occupational_info: Looking for new ways to reconnect with a world already lost.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed in what I have in my life and I would like to share this gift with others.
lender.occupational_info: I have a pizza restaurant in downtown Houston, Texas. It is a good restaurant and I enjoy working there. I have about 15 employees that help me each day. It is hard work and long hours but very rewarding.

lender.name: The Parkers
lender.loan_because: As we have been given as much as we need from God above, we want to give and loan to others to enable them to get what they need and improve their future.
lender.occupational_info: Owner and developer of commercial real estate

lender.name: Sarah

lender.name: John Melnicki
lender.loan_because: “Live a good life. If there are gods and they are just, then they will not care how devout you have been, but will welcome you based on the virtues you have lived by. If there are gods, but unjust, then you should not want to worship them. If there are no gods, then you will be gone, but will have lived a noble life that will live on in the memories of your loved ones.” ― Marcus Aurelius

lender.name: Talent
lender.occupational_info: Talent Gurus strategic outsourcing solutions help you outperform your competition in a cost effective manner by allowing you to focus on core competencies thereby boosting productivity and increasing profits. Clients worldwide have access to a vast talent pool of resources through our state-of-the-art offshore facility in Hyderabad, India.
